Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Cleanliness \Clean"li*ness\ (kl[e^]n"l[i^]*n[e^]s), n. [From {Cleanly}.] State of being cleanly; neatness of person or dress. [1913 Webster]
Cleanliness from head to heel. --Swift. [1913 Webster]
cleanliness n 1: the habit of keeping free of superficial imperfections [ant: {uncleanliness}] 2: diligence in keeping clean [ant: {uncleanliness}]
